# zentral_mdm_enrollment_custom_view (Resource)

The resource `zentral_mdm_enrollment_custom_view` manages MDM enrollments custom views.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `html` (String) HTML template.
- `name` (String) Name of the MDM enrollment custom view.

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the MDM enrollment custom view.
- `requires_authentication` (Boolean) If `true`, the custom view will be displayed after the realm authentication. Default is `false`.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) ID of the MDM enrollment custom view.
